resources.string: Q1 : It\'s possible to set visibility of some view using view.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE) from code .
Q2 : In order to set text in some text view like this question.setText(getResources().getText(id)); you must explicitly specify that question is not a general View but a specific TextView

Q3 : To prevent onCreate from being called each time device\'s orientation is being changed , you can add OnlyOnce to the call of the base class , like this: super.onCreate(savedInstanceState,\"OnlyOnce\")"
